name: Chitika
overview: Chitika is an online ad network that caters over four billion strategically targeted ads each month to a network of over 250,000+ sites, making it the second largest network of its kind. Chitika ads are known across the industry for their ability to perform unlike any other, leveraging its proprietary targeting and optimization technology - a delicate blend of “Art + Science”- to ensure delivery of intent driven ads to the right user, at the right time and in the right place. Chitika’s advertising partners include; Yahoo!, Superpages, yellowbook, ServiceMagic and Shopzilla, and are leveraged by publishers in the network to drive audience engagement and boost revenue.

milestones.description: Chitika was recognized by a known leader in finding and advocating the most promising tech startups. We have been selected as one of the 100 most innovative private technology companies based in North America.
milestones.source_description: Chitika Selected as a Red Herring North America 100 Winner

milestones.description: With the rise of behavioral advertising, questions about consumer privacy have become more frequent. By becoming a member of the IAB, we seek to not only educate users on their options, but to empower them to make their own decisions.
Chitika introduces Mobile ads, allowing publishers to monetize their mobile traffic.
milestones.source_description: Monetize Your Mobile Traffic With Chitika Ads

milestones.description: With the List Unit ads, Publishers can choose up to 9 ads per unit. The height will automatically adjust, omitting any unwanted white space in the ad unit. Publishers using these ads have seen a 32% increase in CTR compared to the regular Chitika ads.
Chitika introduces a full-featured mapping service. While other services are beginning to charge for map usage starting in 2012, Chitika's brand new maps are free to use.
milestones.source_description: Chitika Maps: We'll Pay You to Use Them

milestones.description:
Chitika's in-app ads are non intrusive and integrated into the app, which preserves the original look and feel of the app. Posted by Sarah On Sep 27

For all those App developers out there, get excited – Chitika is now serving Ads for Apps!

We know h
milestones.source_description: Got an App? We've Got an Ad For That.

milestones.description: These ads increase action rates for local ads. Local viewers are more likely to click these ads because it will put them in direct contact with the advertiser.
milestones.source_description: Chitika Introduces Pay Per Call Ads

What It’s Like to Work at Chitika
